dialogue.line: Fine... You win..
Yeah!
Just, go away! Please.
Dave comes out of the corn.
Oh shit!
Hey, I'm here. Sorry, I was running late.
Tristan was a pain to get up.
He was like "But Dave.." this, "But Dave.." that.
Don't talk about me like I'm not here!
With all due respect, son, shut up.
Oh. Ohhh, ohhhhhh!
So I BROKE MY PHONE FOR NO REASON!
And I have no idea why you thought that was a good idea...
I'M SO STUPID!
It's okay Bambi, everyone makes mistakes from time to time!
Even very stupid mistakes that could've easily been averted.
I see straight through your sarcasm!
Lets just get this picnic started.
That would be great!
Beep!
Everyone eventually settles down and has a picnic.
To be continued...
